abstract: Tim Burton, the filmmaker, has created a character called B. Boy that will make its first appearance as a balloon in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade next month.
snippet: Tim Burton, the filmmaker, has created a character called B. Boy that will make its first appearance as a balloon in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade next month.

headline.main: Tim Burton Lines Up a Spot in Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
headline.print_headline: A Tim Burton Cloud for Macy’s Sunny Skies
